EmbellishmentAnalysis.HelpText: An overview of all Embellishment effects available

CharacterCreator.StatMessage: While Stat Weights are editable, the QE Live defaults are recommended for most situations.

AddPlanDialog.ButtonTooltip: Add a new plan with a sample log, a set of defaults, or a blank slate.

CopyPlanDialog.ButtonTooltip: Copy a plan under a new name

DeletePlanDialog.HeaderTitle: Are you sure you want to delete the current plan?

CooldownPlanner.DuplicatePlanError: Duplicate plan name detected, please choose another.

Errors.DuplicatePlanWarning: Duplicate plan name detected, Importing this plan will overwrite it with this import!
Errors.HeaderError: This does not appear to be a QE Planner String, please check it and try again
Errors.StringError: There's something wrong with the string, please check it and try again

NoteExportDialog.NoteExportTooltip: Export your plan into a note format compatible with ERT / MRT.

InsertLog.InsertLogHeader: Paste Your Warcraft Logs Report Here

MainMenu.CharHelpText: Add your characters here. Right click to edit your stat weights, realm information and more.
MainMenu.PatronInvite: Has the app helped you? Support it on Patreon!
MainMenu.PatronThanks: Thank you so much for your support!

Tooltips.LegendaryAnalysis: Your specs best legendaries and where to craft them
Tooltips.Profile: Edit your details and connect to Patreon
Tooltips.QuickCompare: A quick view of all your items at once
Tooltips.TierSets: Find out how strong your classes tier sets are.
Tooltips.TrinketAnalysis: Find out which trinkets are good
Tooltips.CircletAnalysis: Check out 11.0.7s new Circlet effect ring!

Tooltip.ClassicSimC: Insert a QE Import string to import your gear.
Tooltip.InsertLog: Insert a log to increase accuracy.
Tooltip.RetailSimC: Insert a SimC string to import your gear.

QeProfile.EmailMsg: Enter/Update your Email to link to Patreon

QuickCompare.HelpText: Quick Compare allows you to compare items one by one. Scores include stats, gems and effects, but not set bonuses or diminishing returns. Use Top Gear to include those.
QuickCompare.ItemErrorMsg: Item Not Added. Ilvl Cap exceeded.
QuickCompare.Title: Quick Compare

includeGroupBenefits.title: Ally Buffs
includeGroupBenefits.tooltip: Estimate value from stats you give to your group.

circletOptions.title: Circlet Combos
circletOptions.tooltip: A temporary way to specify which gems you'd like to run in your Circlet.

incarnateAllies.title: Incarnate Icon Roles
incarnateAllies.tooltip: Select which roles in your party are wearing the trinket.

idolGems.title: JC Idol Trinkets
idolGems.tooltip: Select how many associated gems you have in your gear.

alchStonePotions.title: Alch Stone
alchStonePotions.tooltip: Number of extra potions Alch Stone gives you over a fight.

upgradeFinderMetric.title: Upgrade Finder
upgradeFinderMetric.tooltip: Toggle to show Upgrade Finder in raw or % values.

rubyWhelpShell.title: Ruby Whelp Specialization
rubyWhelpShell.tooltip: If you've trained your Ruby Whelp Shell, then you can pick its training target here.

broodkeeperCloseTime.title: Broodkeeper Proximity Uptime %
broodkeeperCloseTime.tooltip: The percentage of time you're standing next to your ally. 70% by default.

groupBuffValuation.title: Ally Buffs Scaling
groupBuffValuation.tooltip: Pick between valuing buffs to allies at full or half value.

catalystLimit.title: Catalyst Limit
catalystLimit.tooltip: Pick the maximum number of Catalyst items Top Gear will put in a set.

primordialGems.title: Primordial Gems
primordialGems.tooltip: Let QE Live set up your gems for you, or pick out a specific set.

lariatGems.title: Lariat Gems
lariatGems.tooltip: Select the number of gems that you have socketed in your gear.

topGearAutoGem.title: Auto-add Sockets
topGearAutoGem.tooltip: Automatically add sockets to eligible items.

chromaticEssenceBuff.title: Ominous Chromatic Buff
chromaticEssenceBuff.tooltip: Select which buff you'd like to run.

chromaticEssenceAllies.title: Ominous Chromatic Allies
chromaticEssenceAllies.tooltip: Chromatic Ominous can be calculated with all or no ally buffs.

flaskChoice.title: Flask
flaskChoice.tooltip: Pick which flask you want QE Live to use.

runeChoice.title: Rune
runeChoice.tooltip: Pick which rune you want QE Live to use.

gemSettings.title: Gem Settings
gemSettings.tooltip: Simple will use a strong default choice for your spec. Precise will run separate sets for each gem combination.

creepingCoagOverheal.title: Overheal: Creeping Coag
creepingCoagOverheal.tooltip: Expected overhealing for the Creeping Coagulum trinket.

misterPickMeUpOverheal.title: Overheal: Mr Pick-me-up
misterPickMeUpOverheal.tooltip: Expected overhealing for the Mr Pick-me-up trinket.

ovinaxAverageIntStacks.title: Ovinax Avg Int Stacks
ovinaxAverageIntStacks.tooltip: The number of intellect stacks you'll average with the Ovi'nax trinket. Secondary stacks auto-calculated.

dpsFlag.title: DPS Flag
dpsFlag.tooltip: Include DPS for specs that don't do it naturally as part of their healing rotation. Does not effect Disc Priest, Pres Evoker. May effect which trinkets you can proc.

syringeHealProcs.title: Syringe % Heal Procs
syringeHealProcs.tooltip: The percentage of your Gruesome Syringe trinket procs that you expect to heal instead of giving you intellect.

delayOnUseTrinkets.title: Delay On-Use Trinkets
delayOnUseTrinkets.tooltip: If true, will delay on-use trinkets to try and line them up with a major cooldown if they do not already. Trinkets do lose average stats this way and so it's not always an upgrade to do so.

pheromoneSecreter.title: Pheromone Secreter
pheromoneSecreter.tooltip: Pick which secondaries you intend to socket in your Pheromone Secreter trinket.

calculateEmbellishments.title: Use Embellishments
calculateEmbellishments.tooltip: Take into account embellishments' impact in sims. Useful for 3-crafted-items situation where you can move one of the embellishments.

socketedGems.title: Socketed Gems
socketedGems.tooltip: Number of gems you have socketed. Ignored by Top Gear which will just use your actual set.

liningUptime.title: Lining Uptime
liningUptime.tooltip: Your expected uptime of Dusk / Dawnthread lining during moments where you are actually healing.

manaProfile.title: Mana Profile
manaProfile.tooltip: Pick a more or less aggressive mana profile.

classicGemSettings.title: Gem Rarity
classicGemSettings.tooltip: Pick whether you'd like to use Rare or Epic gems.

metric.title: Scoring Metric
metric.tooltip: Pick whether to include DPS value in your score or not.

wristEnchant.title: Wrist Enchant
wristEnchant.tooltip: While intellect is always better, it's also very expensive which can be prohibitive during early gearing.

bootsEnchant.title: Boot Enchant
bootsEnchant.tooltip: While lavawalker is generally better, it's ok to use a haste enchant in early gearing to help reach breakpoints.

numManaTides.title: Mana Tide #
numManaTides.tooltip: Select the number of Resto Shamans in your raid, not the number of times they'll drop the totem.

professionOne.title: First Profession
professionOne.tooltip: Select which profession you have levelled if you'd like them included in the results.

professionTwo.title: Second Profession
professionTwo.tooltip: Select which profession you have levelled if you'd like them included in the results.

reforgeSetting.title: Reforge Setting
reforgeSetting.tooltip: Select how you'd like Reforges handled. Smart takes care of it for you at quite a high accuracy rate. Manual lets you pick specific reforges yourself.

hasteBuff.title: Haste Buffs
hasteBuff.tooltip: Pick which haste buffs you have active to in raid. Haste Aura is provided my Moonkin, Shadow Priest and Shaman and applies to the entire raid. Dark Intent is 3% but only applies to one target.

Snackbars.EmailError: Please check the Email and try again

Soulbinds.ConduitInstructions: Right/Left Click Conduits to change Ilvl
Soulbinds.RenownTooltip: Import your Renown via SimC / Enter your Renown level here

SourceToggle.FilterTooltip: You can filter the graph by toggling these buttons

TopGear.CompetitiveAlternativeHelp: This is how close other sets are to your best (pictured above). Anything close in score can be considered a sidegrade.
TopGear.ErrorMessage: So sorry, seems you've run into an error. This is usually caused by not being able to create any valid sets. Check that you have an intellect weapon selected, two or more rings and two or more trinkets. If multiple legendaries are selected then there must be a valid alternative for each.
TopGear.HelpTextClassic: Top Gear lets you compare every possible combination of your selected gear at once!
TopGear.HelpTextRetail: Top Gear lets you compare every possible combination of your selected gear at once!
TopGear.ItemsHereMessage: Import gear via SimC or QE Import string, pick any items you want to compare, then hit 'Go'.
TopGear.Title: Top Gear

TrinketAnalysis.HelpText: Use the graph below as a rough guide of which trinkets are worth pursuing.

UpgradeFinderFront.HelpText: Find your next item with instance-by-instance and slot-by-slot item lists, all based on your specific character.
UpgradeFinderFront.MythicPlusBody: Use the slider to select dungeon item level
UpgradeFinderFront.RaidDifficultyBody: Select up to two difficulties to find upgrades from

Welcome.ContinueMessage: To begin using the app, add one of your characters below.
Welcome.GameTypeMessage: Select which version you'd like to start with.
